item.title: NOK
item.description: score:28 Chances: Nokia’s patent licensing business has been strong, signing multiple agreements in the past year. The company’s focus on cloud-native software and as-a-service delivery models positions it well for the increasing demand for critical networks. Nokia’s technology licensing business and brand licensing for smartphones show potential for future growth.
